Package com.epoch.db

Classes for reading from and writing to the database.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CanonicalizedUnitRW
    Contains all database read and write operations pertaining to conversions of one unit to another.
    CourseRW
    Methods for reading and writing courses.
    DataConversion
    Contains one-time data conversion methods.
    DBCommon
    Stores common SQL words and provides utility functions for running a single update query, to get a pool connection, and to format SQL expressions.
    DBLocalTables
    Stores the database table and field names for locally authored questions and textbooks.
    DBTables
    Stores the database table and field names for master-authored questions and textbooks.
    EnrollmentRW
    Database read-write methods regarding enrollment of students in courses.
    FnalGroupDefRW
    Contains all database read and write operations pertaining to functional group definitions.
    ForumRW
    Handles database operations involving forums.
    HWRead
    Sets, retrieves assignments during assembly or for homework session.
    HWWrite
    Handles storage of assignments, including students' instantiations.
    ImageRW
    Contains methods to read and write images (and movies).
    InstitutionRW
    Contains all database read and write operations pertaining to institutions.
    MolCountTable
    Holds lists of String representations of molecules retrieved from the log file and their number of occurrences.
    OracleErrors
    Holds the specific error codes returned by Oracle.
    QSetRW
    All the read operations for topics and question sets.
    QuestionRead
    Instantiable class containing methods to read a question from the database.
    QuestionRW
    Contains all static methods pertaining to reading and writing questions.
    QuestionWrite
    Instantiable class containing methods to write a question to the database.
    ReactorResultsRW
    Stores and retrieves results of Reactor calculations.
    ResponseLogger
    Logs all responses to a file for each question.
    ResponseRead
    For retrieving student responses to questions in assignments.
    ResponseWrite
    For storing a student's response to a question in an assignment.
    RGroupCollectionRW
    Contains all database read and write operations pertaining to R-group collections.
    SortIgnoreCase
    Allows strings to be sorted ignoring case and accent.
    SQLWithQMarks
    Class that contains an SQL statement containing question marks plus the number of question marks.
    SynthDataRW
    Contains all database read and write operations pertaining to definitions of reaction conditions, bad starting materials, and menu-only reagents.
    TextbookRW
    Contains all methods pertaining to reading and writing textbooks.
    TranslnRead
    Contains all database read and write operations pertaining to translations.
    TranslnWrite
    Contains all database read and write operations pertaining to translations.
    UnitConvertRW
    Contains all database read and write operations pertaining to conversions of one unit to another.
    UserRead
    Database read-write operations related to students and instructors.
    UserWrite
    Database read-write operations related to students and instructors.

Package com.epoch.db Description

Classes for reading from and writing to the database.
